principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Soft UI warmth
Content is King: Data legibility is paramount
Negative Space: Generous padding to reduce cognitive load
Contrast: High contrast for text, subtle contrast for containers

universal_guidelines.testing: ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute in kebab-case (e.g., 'login-submit-btn').
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio. Use 'sr-only' for icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.motion: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list entrance animations. No 'transition: all'.
universal_guidelines.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/70 border border-white/20' for sticky headers and overlays.
universal_guidelines.empty_states: Never leave a list empty. Show a helpful illustration or text with a call to action.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Ensure tailwind.config.js extends the theme with the colors defined above.
3. CREATE LAYOUTS: Build a 'DashboardLayout' component with a sidebar and header.
4. USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn UI components for complex interactions (Dialog, Dropdown, Form), but style them with the 'Soft Utility' classes.
5. DATA-TESTID: Do not forget data-testid on ANY interactive element.
6. NO MOCKING: Implement actual API calls, but if backend is not ready, structure the frontend to easily swap mocks for real data.
7. FILE HANDLING: Use 'react-dropzone' or standard input for file uploads, styled as a large drag-and-drop area.
